version_name: 2.2.0 von CAD Pockets bietet fundamentale Erweiterungen

version_description:
New version 2.2 of CAD Pockets is coming with fundamental improvements, brand new drawing and annotation experience, to boost your mobile working efficiency and accuracy:

1."Drag-to-Draw" experience, easier and faster.

2.Support "coordinate input" to draw precisely.

3.Newly added "coordinate query" feature.

4.Improved "coordinate dimension", presenting X & Y coordinates at the same time.

5.Improved prompts when creating dimensions, to make it easier to learn and use.

1. Newly added Ortho Mode, so that you can draw absolutely vertically and horizontally.
2. Full screen mode now become read-only! Especially designed for you to view drawing in details without making a mess.
3. Now you can turn on or off the coordination system as you need.
Fix Bugs.
Fix Bugs.

Newly added 9 kinds of object snap mode,so far CAD Pockets support 12 object snap mode intotal, including Endpoint, Midpoint, Center, Insertion, Intersection, Nearest, Node, Perpendicular, Parallel, Quadrant, Tangent, Parallel, Extend. The complete Osnap ensure your design with unimpeachable precision.
Serious bug fixes：Fix crash on iOS8.

1.Recently opened drawing list
2.Text search & count
3.Reorder folders
4.Adjust coordinates to meet measuring requirements
* Fixed bug: could not open drawings from third party app directly, such as mailbox, chat tools.
Compatible with iOS10.

CAD Pockets V3.0 has finally arrived! This time, we put our most effort into annotation module, to make it even more intelligent, powerful and easy to use. We hope you can feel more productive and useful when viewing and annotating in CAD Pockets.

1.[More Powerful] Brand new Multi-image Annotation feature, allows you to insert many images at one point with descriptions to each one. These images can be expanded or folded, to not affect checking your drawings.
2.[More Intelligent] Revcloud is now smarter, it will ask you to put some text after making a revcloud.
3.[More Accurate] Newly added Accuracy Settings, to let you control how many digit you want to display after decimal point.
4.[More Easy-to-use] Newly added floating annotation toolbar, with Smart Revcloud, Free sketch, Text, Mulit-image Annotation and SmartVoice, so that you can easier to reach all kinds of annotating tools, make it easier to place your ideas.
5.[More Choice] Newly added cloud storage: Kenesto.

Besides, we now officially enabled the subscription purchase of Premium account, so that you can directly buy or extend your Premium privilege. The Multi-image Annotation and Accuracy Settings are both Premium features, but we would like to thank you all for your support, so we decided to open both of them to all CAD Pockets users for free until next update. Come and enjoy!

V3.0.1 has further enhanced the user experience of CAD Pockets:

- Support to switch images in Multi-image Annotation

- Autohide of floating toolbar

- AREA and DIST can be affected by presicion setting

- Support GoogleDrive and Dropbox again

- Other stability enhancements: crash when creating dimension and sharing drawings.

1. Newly added Block Palette: a place to store all your frequently-used blocks, which can be customized and synced online

2. Newly added OneDrive for Business

3. Improved user experience of dimensioning and magnifier

4. More file format listed: doc/docx, ppt/pptx, xls/xlsx，mp4, avi, mpeg (can be opened by 3rd party Apps)

1. New column "Events” is now online, where you can browse all the ongoing marketing events of CAD Pockets
2. Some bug fixes to improve stability
A lot of improvements were made.
Fixed the crash bug for some models.
Fixed some bugs.
Fixed some bugs.

3. Entity snap can be set separately.
4. Font package changed to manual download.
5. Adds an identifier to the new file in the network disk.
6. Adds Cloudike cloud disk.

V4.0.0:CAD Pockets V4.0 has finally arrived!
This time, we have made a big change to the app and website. The Newly designed interface brings you a new visual experience. In addition, CAD Pockets launches the Collaborate Edition that helps your team communicate online at anytime, anywhere, as well as on the website (www.cadpockets.com). Come and enjoy it with your team!
1.Newly designed interface UI for app and web.
2.Collaborate Edition: create team, invite members, communicate online, assign tasks and share massive cloud space with your team.
3.New cloud storage added to Cloud Drawings: CAD Pockets Cloud.

1.Printing: support window selection, and remember print settings
2.Fixed bug for arc dimension.
3.Fixed bug for endpoint snapping
4.Fixed crash for One Drive connection.
